text: Cordon Bleu or Chicken Cordon Bleu is a type of chicken dish usually with a sauce. It is made with chicken breast and filled with a slice of ham and cheese and then covered in breadcrumbs and fried. Cordon bleu was invented in Switzerland, about the 1940s. It was first mentioned in a cookbook from 1949. ==Related pages== * Chicken Kiev Category:Chicken as food Category:French food Category:Swiss food
title: Cordon Bleu
